Tags.description: Metadata to assign to the application. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

Key.description: The key-value string map. The valid character set is [a-zA-Z1-9 +-=._:/-]. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key-value string map. The valid character set is [a-zA-Z1-9 +-=._:/-]. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:.)[a-zA-Z1-9+=._:/-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The tag value can be up to 256 characters.
Value.markdownDescription:
The tag value can be up to 256 characters.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption
